original_title: Goonie-Boys: Curse of the Mayan Coin
overview: A story about four boys who believe their hometown is cursed. The boys, Alex, Camilo, David and Roger are hired by Remedios (a local witch) to find Laughing Man, which is a long lost Mayan lucky charm. The boys agree to find Laughing Man if Remedios lifts the town curse and helps the football team win again.
title: Goonie-Boys: Curse of the Mayan Coin
